title: PitchPilot - Founder Deck Builder
description: Deck generation tool for Indian founders raising pre-seed rounds. Need testers to validate deck templates, data-room links, and export quality across devices.
testingInstructions:
1. Create an account.
2. Generate one pitch deck using the SaaS template.
3. Edit traction slide and export to PDF.
4. Share via public link and verify mobile readability.
5. Report any formatting issues.

title: ShipFast Mobile - CI/CD Assistant
description: A workflow tool for Android/iOS app releases. Looking for indie app devs to test changelog generation, release checklist automation, and crash rollback prompts.
testingInstructions:
1. Connect one demo project.
2. Generate release checklist and changelog.
3. Simulate a failed release and test rollback suggestions.
4. Submit final feedback form.

title: StackScope - API Observability
description: Developer-focused API monitor with request traces and latency alerts. Need testers for onboarding flow, alert tuning, and dashboard readability.
testingInstructions:
1. Add two API endpoints.
2. Configure alert threshold and email destination.
3. Trigger one timeout to validate alerting.
4. Review traces and suggest dashboard improvements.
